query: Real West Gravel gravel race Pendleton

videos.title: Real West Gravel 2025  - Pendleton, Oregon
videos.description:
Gravel racing in Pendleton, Oregon.  The race day conditions were wet and windy making for a very challenging 60+ miles of cycling (suffering) in the countryside around Pendleton.  Warning,  there is no music added to this vid.. just the sound of wind, grunts, heaving breathing and the odd curse word from me.  It's also long so if TikTok is your thing, skip to around the 12min mark to see some mud,  a little later for a train and soon after that, some farm animals.

Thanks to Mudslinger and the town of Pendleton for a memorable event in another beautiful part of Oregon.

videos.title: Real West Gravel – Ride the High Country
videos.description:
Real West Gravel p/b USWE – Long Edit 2025
🎥 Produced by Elkhorn Media

Pendleton is a special place — where wide-open country, grit, and community come together. Real West Gravel kicks off the season each year with an unforgettable ride, and in 2026 we’ll do it again on the 3rd Sunday in March, launching the first event in the Oregon Triple Crown Series.

From the rolling hills to the legendary gravel roads, this is a ride that’s all about spirit, adventure, and connection. Ride more gravel, share the stoke, and make memories on two wheels. 🚴‍♂️🌄

🎟 Registration for 2026 is now open!
👉 Use code Laborday10 through 9/7 to save 10%.
videos.transcript:
It's my first time up here, but I'm
looking forward to racing with the
Oregon cycling community and kind of
seeing what the Mudslinger events are
all about.
We're excited to explore all the gravel
that this region has to offer.
[Music]
Good gravel. The roads were pretty
smooth all in all. And some good
climbing on the back side.
>> It's really about the the individual
competing with myself more than anything
else.
This event features some of the most
amazing gravel roads anywhere in the
state of Oregon and the West.
I like that it challenges me and it
gives me a chance to be competitive and
in something that I can actually swim.

videos.title: Pendleton Real West Course Recon 2026
videos.description: Recon ride of the 2026 Mudslinger Real West Gravel Race course. A beautiful course that will be very fast.

videos.title: Real West Gravel p/b USWE Hydration Packs 2024 Rewind Video
videos.description:
Get ready for an unforgettable day in beautiful Pendleton, Oregon, as we kick off the cycling season in true Western style! 
Join USWE Hydration Packs and Travel Pendleton on March 16th, 2025, for the Oregon Triple Crown spring opener. With exciting rides, local charm, and a vibrant community, it's the perfect adventure to start your season right. Mark your calendar for the 3rd weekend in March, and experience Pendleton's best!
